description.fr: Les personnages posent un {FloorMechanism:707} sur une case autour\_<sprite name="cell_around">d'eux lorsqu'ils attaquent.
description.en: Characters place one {FloorMechanism:707} on a cell around\_<sprite name="cell_around"> them when they attack.
description.es: Los personajes ponen un {FloorMechanism:707} en una casilla a su alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around">cuando atacan.
description.de: Wenn die Charaktere angreifen, platzieren sie einen {FloorMechanism:707} auf einem Feld ringsum\_<sprite name="cell_around">sich.
description.pt: Os personagens colocam um {FloorMechanism:707} sobre uma célula em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> deles quando ataca.
